page.title: 18Domesday Mitcham cont.
page.content: Now in 1985 ,the adult fare for a bus ticket is 30p. and a child ticket is 15p.,but after 10:00 the child has to pay the full fare of 30p.I think that a child should only pay 10p. and adults pay 20p. for a ticket. In Mitcham there is a sports centre called the Cannons.It has large grounds and I think that makes it so popular.You can play squash, go swimming and go to judo in the evenings, plus many other things. There are many public parks and commons in Mitcham, all with good grounds. I think Mitcham is a good place to live in. {Charlotte Pearcey.
